Text: FW Baseball TriviaOriginal Message From Chris Bondy Sent Tuesday October PM To Richard Kampmann Subject RE Baseball Trivia not very good Original Message From Richard Kampmann mailto Sent Tuesday October PM To John Yazzo Mike Sussmann Jeff Tucker Kevin Ruscitti Manny Sakellakis Dick Schwartz Neil Pollio Petie Reist Gregg Oliver Patti Nunn Kevin OShea w Ed Olimpio Neil McGovern w Mike Miller Rich Moller Rich Langell King Stephanie Lubben Mike Malaga John Kampmann Jr Haj Keswani Peggy Ron Hardiman Jimbartie Dave Juliana Peter Gould Steve Grossmann w Gus Marty Gilligan Ted Susan FitzGerald Doug Garrett Scott Linda Eveland Dave Distaso Phil Emma Jim Claffey w Frank Conway John Kristie Coyle Rob Crise Rob DiLeo Jeff Brusak Bob Buono Chris Castagna Virginia Augusta Chris Bondy Gordon Brooks w Subject Baseball Trivia I figured we all needed a break from all the and Retaliation news weve received lately To get everyone in the postseason frame of mind here is a trivia question Im sure will stump the most avid basebvall fan There has been an MVP who reveived the award two years in a row at each position center field has two including at pitcher Name them I will share the answers in a future email Im thinking Bert or DiLeo are the only ones who have half a chance at this one Prove me wrong Pitcher Catcher First Base no it was not Rich Kampmann Second Base Third Base Short Stop Left Field Center Field Right Field Do You Yahoo NEW from Yahoo GeoCities quick and easy web site hosting mailustagpsinfo just month
